Here’s an overview of antique appraisal services available in **Calgary**, Alberta:

---

### Overview  
Calgary offers specialized antique appraisal services through accredited professionals focusing on niche categories such as stamps, retro toys, fine art/vintage collectibles (*stamps*, *Star Wars figurines*, *teddy bears*). Local experts combine hands-on evaluations with digital consultations where applicable[1][10].

---

### Antique Appraiser Directory  

#### **Brian Lehman Evaluations**  
- **Specialties**:  
   - Stamp collections (*old Canadian/vintage postage*)[2]  
   - Retro toys (*vintage Star Wars figurines*, *Lego sets*, *antique dolls*)[3]  
   - Fine art/paintings (*antique paintings*, *contemporary works*)[6]  
- **Certifications**: Accredited by professional appraisal associations (**ISA/USPAP-compliant**).  
- **Service Area**: Greater Calgary region (+ virtual consultations).  
- **Contact**: Visit [brianlehmanevaluations.com](https://brianlehmanevaluations.com/) | Phone listings available onsite[2][3].  

#### **Cowley Abbott Auctioneers & Appraisers**  
- **Specialties**: Canadian/international fine art (*historical masterpieces*, *post-war works*)[5].  
- Certifications：Industry-accredited team specializing high-value auctions（$36M+ sales）．
